title: Pixel 4 does not recognise my number
content:
I have had my phone for about a week now, and it still does not recognise my phone number. Simply saying, 'number unknown' when I look at in the settings > About phone menu. 

I have just recently updated the phone and received a notification that another number was registered with my google account but this is not my number as I transferred my existing number from my previous provider. 

I am with BT Mobile in the UK
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
